node.title: Queensland men charged over seizure of more than half a tonne of cocaine in international sting
node.alt: Cocaine bricks seized and stacked in a shipping container
node.description: Australian Federal Police say 540 kilograms of cocaine with a street value of $124 million was hidden inside shipping containers and was seized with the cooperation of Belgian law enforcement.
node.content:
["Two Queensland men have been charged with possessing nearly 540 kilograms of cocaine with an estimated street value of $124 million that police say was hidden inside empty shipping containers.", "The co-accused Jordan Roman Brennan, 26, and Brendan John Sipple, 28, were each charged with two counts of possessing a commercial quantity of cocaine as part of Operation Chopin, a three-year investigation into the large-scale importation of cocaine into Australia.", "Australian Federal Police (AFP) allege the men are close associates of international and domestic members of the Comanchero and Lone Wolf Outlaw motorcycle clubs.", "Police alleged that between June 1 to June 14 last year, the men tried to retrieve 48.5kg of cocaine they believed was hidden inside a refrigerated shipping container that had\u00a0arrived in Brisbane and had been moved to a container storage yard.", "The container had been loaded onto a ship in Panama in early 2020, before passing through Ecuador on the way to Belgium.", "In February 2020, Belgian authorities allegedly seized 42 small packages filled with cocaine that were hidden inside the refrigerated container at the Port of Antwerp.", "", "
The refrigerated container arrived at the Port of Brisbane in June last year.(Supplied: AFP)
", "Belgian officials\u00a0released the container for further passage to Brisbane via the United Arab Emirates and Singapore.", "The container arrived at the Port of Brisbane in June 2020 and was stored at a shipping container storage yard.", "AFP alleged the men made multiple visits to various yards searching for the container, travelling from the Gold Coast in a white van registered in Western Australia.", "They allegedly replaced the number plates with cloned Queensland number plates when they were close to the Port of Brisbane.", "Investigators executed a search warrant at a property in the New South Wales town of Inverell that is linked to Mr Sipple.", "", "
Police found the white van parked at a fossicking shed on a rural property.(Supplied: AFP)
", "Officers found the white van inside an abandoned fossicking shack.", "The matter was adjourned to January 21 and the AFP is preparing a brief of evidence.", "
Drug importers 'ambivalent to the misery and harm caused by their greed'
", "AFP Commander Andrew Donoghoe said the men possessed a commercial quantity of cocaine that would have caused \"significant harm\" to Australians.", "\"Every link in the supply chain contains alleged criminals who are ambivalent to the misery and harm caused by their greed,\" he said.", "Commander Donoghoe said the AFP was committed to working with local and international law enforcement to stop illicit drug importation.", "\"We have an international network of partners and agents that can strike at any point in the supply chain developed by organised criminal syndicates to move illicit drugs from one side of the world to another,\" Commander Donoghoe said.", "\"These charges are a significant result for the agencies involved.\""]
